sentence: Stephen Fitzpatrick said during an April 1 press conference.
author: Patrick Reilly
title: Long Island man arrested in fatal shooting of Northwell Health employee

author: Eyewitness News
title: Former boyfriend of murdered Long Island hospital employee arraigned on murder charges

sentence: "Our investigation also determined that Quay-Sean began to stalk Amelia, and he would show up unannounced at [her work] seeking to rekindle their relationship," Fitzpatrick said.
title: Suspected Killer Went to Gym After Shooting Ex-Girlfriend in NY Parking Garage: DA
